title: banned accounts names are locked? why?
body: i wanted to change my name and saw it on https://lolnames.gg/en/ but when i went to change it the account was banned. why are banned accounts that have expired names not changeable?

replies.body:
First off, that site isn't hosted by Riot AFAIK so there's a chance the data could be pretty incorrect or out of date when compared to our data. Other than that, there's a pretty wide variety of reasons as to why some names aren't opened back up. 

It could be due to them being deemed inappropriate, but also it wouldn't be good for a player to be banned for extreme toxicity, only for someone to take their name and then get attacked for things they never did.

I made that site and just to let you know the data comes from Riot API so it is the same data. Although it doesn't explicitly say when a name is banned the only reason it isn't cleaned up when it says is that it was banned.

I believe the reason names were never made available was Riot used to ban champion names because they didn't want anyone having them. This has since been changed and new champion names are up for grabs.
